zaloPay.instruction: Please pay the amount below to complete the transaction:
zaloPay.note: Note: Payment via ZaloPay will be processed immediately. Please make sure your ticket information is correct before paying.

qr.note: Note: Scan the QR code to pay. Please make sure your ticket information is correct before paying.

alerts.zaloPayMin: Ticket price must be greater than 1000 VND to pay via ZaloPay.

alerts.paymentSuccess: Payment successful! Your ticket has been sent via email.
alerts.paymentEmailError: Error sending ticket via email. Please try again later.
